content: ***find this pattern as a free download from hobbii on september 1 2023*** when the chill of fall is in the air but it s not cool enough for a jacket reach for the chilly pom scarf this extra-long rectangle scarf gets a dose of flair from some geometric color placement and cute little pom poms placed on the ends it s the ultimate accessory to show your personality build a color palette that s uniquely you adjust the size and color placement of your pom poms the customization options are endless **yarn used ** hobbii happy place dk weight #3 50% wool 50% cotton 273 yards per 100g skein a 09 solid 155 yards 1 skein b 01 melange 155 yards 1 skein c 19 solid 155 yards 1 skein d 29 solid 155 yards 1 skein *join the happy place vip email list for exclusive details deals and giveaways - link 1 * 1 https //link brands mvk co/ac5f8e7
